entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Flurries at times heavy this evening. Local blowing snow this evening. Local amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 60 km/h gusting to 80 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 60 this evening. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023
